/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, offering a bird's eye view of the cityscape. The street, lined with lush green trees and bushes, stretches out into the distance, flanked by towering buildings that reach up towards the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The image is captured from a low angle, emphasizing the height of the buildings and the vastness of the sky. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky. The perspective of the image gives a sense of depth and scale, highlighting the urban landscape of Beijing.
